body: really great, only problem is WHERE IS THE TRANSLATION, even though the English translation is missing, the art and story esc makes up for it, I say just leave what they say up to your imagination...or learn kanji. 8/10
It's been years fam. This needs a translation not on the double, but ON THE TRIPLE. QUADRUPLE EVEN.
Now I have a boxer fuck fetish
